identity.description:
Retrieve publications related to a disease EFO ID, including PubMed and PMC IDs with dates.

Retrieve publications related to a disease efoId, including PubMed IDs and publication dates.
capabilities: Retrieve publications for a disease using its EFO ID
Return counts and earliest publication year
Provide PubMed and PMC IDs with publication dates
Include sentence-level context with matched entities

additionalIds.description: List of additional IDs to include in the search.

startYear.description: Year at the lower end of the filter.

startMonth.description: Month at the lower end of the filter.

endYear.description: Year at the higher end of the filter.

endMonth.description: Month at the higher end of the filter.

purpose.model:
SentenceTransformer(
  (0): Transformer({'max_seq_length': 4096, 'do_lower_case': False, 'architecture': 'BertModel'})
  (1): Pooling({'word_embedding_dimension': 384, 'pooling_mode_cls_token': False, 'pooling_mode_mean_tokens': True, 'pooling_mode_max_tokens': False, 'pooling_mode_mean_sqrt_len_tokens': False, 'pooling_mode_weightedmean_tokens': False, 'pooling_mode_lasttoken': False, 'include_prompt': True})
  (2): Normalize()
)

  (2): Normalize()
